009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
018import imagingbook.common.image.access.ImageAccessor;
019import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
020
021/**
022 * <p>
023 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of various pixel interpolation
024 * methods and out-of-bounds strategies. Simple translation is used as the
025 * geometric transformation (parameters can be specified). Note the use if the
026 * {@link ImageAccessor} class which gives uniform access to all types of
027 * images. See Ch. 22 of [1] for more details.
028 * </p>
029 * <p>
030 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
031 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
032 * </p>
033 * 
034 * @author WB
035 * @version 2022/11/28
036 * 
037 * @see InterpolationMethod
038 * @see OutOfBoundsStrategy
039 * @see ImageAccessor
040 */
041public class Map_Interpolation_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
042        
043        private static InterpolationMethod IPM = InterpolationMethod.Bicubic;
044        private static OutOfBoundsStrategy OBS = OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues;
045        
046        private static double dx = 10.50;       // translation parameters
047        private static double dy = -3.25;
048        
049        private ImagePlus im;
050        
051        /**
052         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
053         * is currently open.
054         */
055        public Map_Interpolation_Demo() {
056//              if (noCurrentImage()) {
057//                      DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
058//              }
059                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage() && DialogUtils.askForSampleImage()) {
060                        IjUtils.runPlugIn(Draw_Test_Grid.class);
061                }
062        }
063        
064        // ----------------------------------------
065        
066    @Override
067        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
068        this.im = im;
069        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
070    }
071
072    @Override
073        public void run(ImageProcessor source) {
074        if (!runDialog())
075                        return;
076        
077        final int w = source.getWidth();
078        final int h = source.getHeight();
079        
080        // create the target image (same type as source):
081        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
082        
083        // create ImageAccessor's for the source and target  image:
084        ImageAccessor sA = ImageAccessor.create(source, OBS, IPM);
085        ImageAccessor tA = ImageAccessor.create(target);
086        
087        // iterate over all pixels of the target image:
088        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {   // discrete target position (u,v)
089                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
090                        double x = u + dx;      // continuous source position (x,y)
091                        double y = v + dy;
092                        float[] val = sA.getPix(x, y);
093                        tA.setPix(u, v, val);   // update target pixel
094                }
095        }
096        
097        // display the target image:
098        (new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-" + IPM.toString(), target)).show();
099    }
100    
101    // --------------------------------------------
102    
103        private boolean runDialog() {
104                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
105                gd.addNumericField("Translation dx", dx, 2);
106                gd.addNumericField("Translation dy", dy, 2);
107                gd.addEnumChoice("Interpolation method", IPM);
108                gd.addEnumChoice("Out-of-bounds strategy", OBS);
109
110                gd.showDialog();
111                if (gd.wasCanceled())
112                        return false;
113                
114                dx = gd.getNextNumber();
115                dy = gd.getNextNumber();
116                IPM = gd.getNextEnumChoice(InterpolationMethod.class);
117                OBS = gd.getNextEnumChoice(OutOfBoundsStrategy.class);
118                return true;
119        }
120}
